subject: New file uploaded to EVP-ITC
author: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
full_text:
Hello,

This email message is a notification to let you know that
a file has been uploaded to the Files area of the EVP-ITC 
group.

  File        : /LC's FM Spirit Box Prototype/captain_babcock_SPIRIT_OF_BABCOCK.wav 
  Uploaded by : lcdupla <lcdupla@...> 
  Description : This was recorded in the upstairs bedroom where I believe Mrs. Babcock stayed with her cats. Her husband Captain Babcock was lightkeeper from 1871-1881; then again in 1900-1919. His son also was an assistant keeper from 1901-1919; then keeper from 1919-1925. First question, "Is there a Captain Babcock here?" Then a weird-sounding reply which sounds like "Babcock" (sort of). Then another question is asked, "Is there any ghosts around here?" and the reply, "Spirit of Babcock." 

You can access this file at the URL:
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/files/LC%27s%20FM%20Spirit%20Box%20Prototype/captain_babcock_SPIRIT_OF_BABCOCK.wav 

To learn more about file sharing for your group, please visit:
http://help.yahoo.com/l/us/yahoo/groups/original/members/web/index.htmlfiles

Regards,

lcdupla <lcdupla@...>
